getLog

public static SharedPreferences getLog(Context context)
The log is used for persistent log messages that are used for debugging. They have to be deleted on a regular basis or loging has to be disabled for production code. Otherwise reopening and attaching new logmessages will make the service much slower.

Parameters:
context - The context for the SharedPreferences
Returns:
The SharedPreferences that contain the log

getLogItems

public static java.lang.String[] getLogItems(Context context)

getServiceSettings

public static SharedPreferences getServiceSettings(Context context)
The service settings are used for persistent settings of the service such as username, password, etc.

Parameters:
context - The context for the SharedPreferences
Returns:
The SharedPreferences that contain the service settings

public static SharedPreferences getUserSettings(Context context)
The user settings are used for persistent storage of the user preferences.

Parameters:
context - The context for the SharedPreferences
Returns:
The SharedPreferences that contain the user prefereces
